about.title: About BelajarFinance
about.subtitle: BelajarFinance helps Malaysians learn personal finance the easy way — in both English and Bahasa Malaysia.

paragraphs.p1: Our goal is simple: make financial literacy accessible, practical, and culturally relevant. Whether you’re starting your first job, saving for emergencies, or planning your future — we’re here to guide you step by step.
paragraphs.p2: Everything we build — from calculators to guides — is designed with a mobile-first experience in mind. We believe learning finance should be simple, visual, and interactive.
